titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the former Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service laboratory in Fresno, California, to the City of Fresno.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/15/2004--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey without consideration to Fresno, California, the former Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service laboratory in Fresno to be used for educational purposes.
